summary: This is a U.S. Department of Justice Certification of Identity form completed by Michael C. Miller on August 23, 2019, to request records under the Privacy Act. The form includes his personal details and a declaration under penalty of perjury, but does not specify the records being sought or their connection to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Michael C. Miller
persons.context: Individual submitting a Privacy Act request to the U.S. Department of Justice by completing and signing this certification of identity form.

events.title: Submission of Privacy Act request
events.description: Michael C. Miller signs and dates a Certification of Identity form to request records from the U.S. Department of Justice.

locations: 1114 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY 10036
keyFacts: Michael C. Miller submitted a Privacy Act request to the U.S. Department of Justice on August 23, 2019.
The requester's address is listed as 1114 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY 10036.
The form is a standard DOJ document (FORM DOJ-361) used to certify the identity of someone requesting records.
